archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.3b: b) selecting or improving the effectiveness of the security controls that will reduce the likelihood of serious information security incidents occurring, and/or reduce their impact if they do occur
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
